title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a simple asyncio/sync API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama supporting multi-model conversations, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive terminal UI (TUI) client for chatting with Ollama models using prompt-toolkit.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented Generation example with Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, pull models, embeddings, list models, etc.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, voice chat, Docker setups, fine-tuning, RAG examples and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose snippets for running Ollama containerized with CUDA support.

title: chatbox-ai
summary: Cross-platform desktop chat client (Windows/Mac/Linux) that supports Ollama and OpenAI APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async HTTP bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat and embedding methods, available on NuGet.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs for Go, Ruby, PHP, Swift and more.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama (and OpenAI) responses into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models in Slack threads.

title: ollama-rag-streamlit
summary: Streamlit example deploying a RAG chatbot backed by Ollama and Chroma in <100 lines.
